verses.verse: Now the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H1066>Bochim.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H935>led<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your fathers; and I <S%H1>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H559>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5769>break<s%> My <S%H6565>covenant<s%> with you,

and as for you, you shall <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> you shall <S%H5422>tear<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars.<s%>' But you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H6963><s%> Me; <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%>?

"Therefore I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will not <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall <S%H1961>become<s%> [as thorns] in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to you.'"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voices<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>
So they <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1066>Bochim;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

When <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H7971>dismissed<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H748>survived<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> at the <S%H1121>age<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten.<s%>

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in Timnath-heres, in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H6828>north<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1608>Gaash.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> that generation <S%H1571>also<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> to their fathers; and there <S%H1>arose<s%> <S%H6965>another<s%> generation <S%H312>after<s%> them <S%H310>who<s%> did not <S%H834>know<s%> the <S%H3045>Lord,<s%> <S%H3068>nor<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> the <S%H1571>work<s%> <S%H4639>which<s%> He had <S%H834>done<s%> for <S%H6213>Israel.<s%>
Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%>

and they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their fathers, who had <S%H1>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H3318>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H4714>followed<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310>other<s%> <S%H312>gods<s%> from [among] the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H430>peoples<s%> <S%H5971>who<s%> were <S%H834>around<s%> them, and <S%H5439>bowed<s%> themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> to them; thus they <S%H7812>provoked<s%> the <S%H3707>Lord<s%> to <S%H3068>anger.<s%>
So they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> and the <S%H9441>Ashtaroth.<s%>

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H8154>plunderers<s%> who <S%H8155>plundered<s%> them; and He <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> [them,] so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

<S%H3605>Wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H3318>went,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was against them for <S%H9567>evil,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them, so that they were <S%H3966>severely<s%> <S%H9503>distressed.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6965>raised<s%> up <S%H8199>judges<s%> who <S%H3467>delivered<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of those who <S%H8154>plundered<s%> them.

And <S%H1571>yet<s%> they did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> for they <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> to them. They <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> their fathers had <S%H1>walked<s%> in <S%H1980>obeying<s%> the <S%H8085>commandments<s%> of the <S%H4687>Lord;<s%> they <S%H3068>did<s%> not <S%H6213>do<s%> as [their fathers].

And <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6965>raised<s%> up <S%H8199>judges<s%> for them, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with the <S%H8199>judge<s%> and <S%H3467>delivered<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8199>judge;<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H5162>moved<s%> to <S%H5162>pity<s%> by their <S%H5009>groaning<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of those who <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> and <S%H1766>afflicted<s%> them.

But it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H4194>died,<s%> that they would <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H7843>act<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> their fathers, in <S%H1>following<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310>other<s%> <S%H312>gods<s%> to <S%H430>serve<s%> them and <S%H5647>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to them; they did not <S%H7812>abandon<s%> their <S%H5307>practices<s%> or their <S%H4611>stubborn<s%> <S%H7186>ways.<s%>

So the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> has <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> their fathers, and has not <S%H1>listened<s%> to My <S%H8085>voice,<s%>

I <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> when he <S%H4191>died,<s%>

in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H5254>test<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by them, whether they will <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in it as their fathers <S%H1>did,<s%> <S%H8104>or<s%> not. "

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> allowed <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H5117>remain,<s%> not <S%H3423>driving<s%> them out <S%H4118>quickly;<s%> and He did not <S%H5414>give<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>
